project_descr: The project is meant to enhance the ability to export goods from Malawi by reducing the need for re-testing, re-inspection, re-certification abroad through acceptance of measurements, tests, conformity assessment results issued in Malawi.

outputs.output_descr:
Strengthened capacity of the Malawi Bureau of Standards to deliver business
services and to achieve financial sustainability
donor_name: UN DEPT OF ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL AFFAIRS
